name: Afflict
effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage and may place a card in their discard pile into their hand.

name: Catacomb Drone
effect: Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.

name: Encroach
effect: Unleash. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If a player turn order card was revealed, that player suffers 2 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Heart of Nothing
effect:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand.

Power 2: Unleash twice. OR Any player suffers 4 damage.

name: Howling Spinners
effect: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Night Unending
effect: Power 3: Gravehold suffers 2 damage for each spell prepped by the player with the most prepped spells.

name: Nix
effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards their most expensive card in hand.

name: Planar Collision
effect:
To Discard: Discard two prepped spells.

Power 2: Unleash twice.

name: Thrash
effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two cards in hand.

name: Aphotic Sun
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 3 damage and loses all of their charges.

name: Chaos Flail
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player places their discard pile on top of their deck and shuffles it. Then, that player reveals the top two cards of their deck and destroys the most expensive card revealed.

name: Mage Ender
effect: Persistent: The player with the most opened breaches suffers 2 damage.

name: Mangleroot
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. This minon suffers 2 damage.

name: Morbid Gyre
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.

name: Mutilate
effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Null Scion
effect: Persistent: Unleash.

name: Smite
effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Apocalypse Ritual
effect:
To Discard: Spend 8 Æ.

Power 2: Gravehold suffers 5 damage for each nemesis turn order card in the turn order discard pile.

name: Banish
effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage for each of their prepped spells.

name: Cataclysmic Fate
effect:
To Discard: Destroy a prepped spell that costs 5 Æ or more and a breach in which it was prepped.

Power 1: The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

name: Monstrosity of Omens
effect:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.

Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.

name: Engulf
effect: Resolve the most recently discarded attack card in the nemesis discard pile.

name: Quell
effect: Gravehold Suffers 7 damage. OR Unleash three times.

name: Throttle
effect: Unleash twice. Any player destorys their three most expensive cards in hand.

name: Withering Beam
effect: Power 2: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.
